content:
Hi — I went in to verify my
phone number as requested but also need my
Password to complete verification.  I don’t remember my password.  I have submitted a request for password reset three times now and I have yet to receive and email with link on how to reset password.  Have checked my spam too and it’s not there.  Any suggestions?
Hi Joan, I will help you with this. Can you go to User Settings > My Account and make sure the email there is what you are using to request the password reset.
Carolyn -  Thank you.  A link to reset finally showed up in my email.
I don’t know where to find user settings in my account
Click the gear icon next to your profile picture at the bottom of your discord screen.
On mobile, tap "you" in lower-left, then tap gear in upper-right, then tap account. If you see a phone number you are good.
On desktop or browser, click the gear in lower-left, click My Account in left menu.

I did what you said on mobile but after I clicked on the gear I didn’t see account to tap. There was a user profile. I tapped that but there was no phone number or place for it. Same with server profile

are you iPhone or Android?
I will share screenshots with you in a couple of hours.
